== Examples

=== Read a Bunch of CSVs

If we wished to consume a directory of CSV files as structured documents we can use a glob pattern and the `csv` scanner:

[source,yaml]
----
input:
  file:
    paths: [ ./data/*.csv ]
    scanner:
      csv: {}
----
